name: UIScreen.OverscanCompensation
desc: Describes different techniques for compensating for pixel loss at the edge of the screen.

items.name: case scale
items.desc: The final composited framebuffer for the screen is scaled so that all pixels lie in the area visible on the screen.

items.name: case insetBounds
items.desc: The screen bounds are reduced in size so that all pixels in the framebuffer are visible on the screen.

items.name: case none
items.desc: No scaling occurs. Use overscanCompensationInsets to get the insets required to avoid clipping.
